== ubuntu 12.04 LTS 32bit with extra installed packages ==

<nowiki>[[File:stick.jpg]]</nowiki>

== What's added ==
* Language packet (NL or FR)
* All restricted multimedia codecs
* VLC
* Gimp
* Inkscape
* Official be-eid reader software
* Tuxpaint
* Myunity
* Configured for Azerty keyboard by default
* Dutch and English manuals of ubuntu 12.04LTS in a folder on the desktop (French version is still to make)
